item.title: CVE-2022-40209|2024-08-03T12:14:39.814Z -- xylus%20themes -- wp%20smart%20import
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Xylus Themes WP Smart Import plugin <= 1.0.2 on WordPress.
